property.name: Description
property.value: The template describes experiments where a car simulator is used in examining the driver's attention during monotonous and dangerous traffic situations. Experiments are based on the method of event related potentials (ERP) and measurement of peripheral biological signals. The template contains description of the car stimulator, amplifier, electrodes, analysis, tested subject and experimenters. It also describes other hardware and software used.

property.name: Type
property.value: [Large; 58 - 62 cm (dark blue), Medium; 54 - 58 cm (red), Small; 50 - 54 cm (yellow)]

property.name: Description
property.value: EEG cap captures the signal of neuronal activity in the brain from the head surface using electrode application technique.

property.value: Electro-Cap International, Inc. Eaton, Ohio 45320 USA

property.name: Description
property.value: An electrode is an electrical conductor used to make contact with a nonmetallic part of a circuit (e.g., the human scalp) and is used to measure electrical activity. http://purl.bioontology.org/NEMO/ontology/NEMO.owl#NEMO_0000501

property.value: V-Amp 16

property.name: Type
property.value: digital DC amplifier input 5V DC, 450mA

property.name: Description
property.value: The V-Amp is used for recording EEG signal and the full range of evoked potentials. Amplifier has two auxiliary ports for measuring peripheral signals like GSR, blood flow, body temperature.

property.name: Title
property.value: ELECTRO-GEL NET:16

property.name: Description
property.value: This electro-gel is an off white color, water-miscible conductive gel. Electro-gel is a mixture of the following components: Water, Sodium Chloride, Aragum, Glycerin, Pottasium Bitartrate, Methylparaben and Propylparaben. Electro gel is applied by inserting the gel into the EEG cap electrodes by using a syringe and blunted needle. Electro gel is used for setting low electrode impedance and limitations of electrode artifacts.

property.name: Description
property.value: Ten20 is a conductive and adhesive paste specifically formulated for use with reusable (non-disposable) electrodes. Primarily used for EEG electrodes. (http://www.biopac.com/ten20-conductivegel)
